history.proof: hauto use: mm_div2_progress inv: prod, bool.

exceptions.tactic: apply mm_div2_spec_0 with (k := k) (v := v); auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat src, quo, rem : pos n Hsq : src <> quo Hsr : src <> rem Hqr : quo <> rem i : nat mm_div2_spec_0 : forall (k : nat) (v w : vec nat n), v#>src = 2 * k -> v#>rem = 0 -> w = v[0/src][(k + (v#>quo))/quo] -> (i, mm_div2) // (i, v) -+> (6 + i, w) mm_div2_spec_1 : forall (k : nat) (v w : vec nat n), v#>src = 1 + 2 * k -> v#>rem = 0 -> w = v[0/src][(k + (v#>quo))/quo][1/rem] -> (i, mm_div2) // (i, v) -+> (6 + i, w) v : vec nat n k : nat st : nat * vec nat n H0 : v#>quo = 0 H1 : v#>rem = 0 H3 : st = (6 + i, v[0/src][k/quo][0/rem]) Unable to unify "exists k : nat, 0 < k /\\ (i, mm_div2) // (i, v) -[k]-> (6 + i, ?M1461)" with "exists k : nat, 0 < k /\\ (i, mm_div2) // (i, v) -[k]-> st".

original: intros H0 H1 H2 H3. destruct H2 as [H2a H2b]. - apply mm_div2_spec_0 with (k := k) (v := v); auto. - apply mm_div2_spec_1 with (k := k) (v := v); auto.
